sections.heading: Short title.Section 20-13-2 - Military airborne hazards and open burn pit registry; creation; duties.
sections.text:
This act may be cited as the "Senior Master Sergeant Jessey Baca Military Airborne Hazards and Open Burn Pit Registry Act".

History:Laws 2015, ch. 94, § 1.

Effective dates.— Laws 2015, ch. 94, § 3 made Laws 2015, ch. 94, § 1 effective July 1, 2015.
